title: F/S - T206 HOF, SLer and Common
author: Edwolf1963

posts.post_title: F/S - T206 HOF, SLer and Common
posts.post_content:
Most sold from recent posts, rather than lower price and bump partial remaining on 4 different posts, I'll put what's left here and lower price.  Last bump/price reduction.  All prices are shipped, PayPal "payment owed" preferred.

*Charlie Fritz, SGC40, Pied350. No visible creases, rounded corners - $80 **SOLD**
*Dots Millers, Batting, SGC50, Pied350. Good center on front, o/c back - $33
*Hugh Duffy, BVG 3.5, SC 350-460 (Fact 30). Great image! Cleanest card of the lot, bright white, diamond cut, faint wrinkle in lower left corner - $110
*T206 Steve Evans, SGCA, Pied350. Great card, color, image - trimmed. $22
*Mordecai Brown, Portrait, SGC40, Pied350 - $115.  Great card/color, dead centered. Slight corner wrinkle in lower left **SOLD**

Thank you for your time and interest!

Ed
Hey Ed- E-mail sent on the Brown. Thank you.
